meanings.definition: Promoting the excretion of uric acid in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The uricosuric medication helped my body get rid of excess uric acid.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe uricosuric drugs to help with gout.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a uricosuric superhero, flushing out uric acid like a champion.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was like a uricosuric force, eliminating negativity from her life.
meanings.sent5: The uricosuric treatment was like a cleansing wave, washing away uric acid troubles.

meanings.definition: A substance that promotes the excretion of uric acid in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a uricosuric to help with my uric acid levels.
meanings.sent2: Uricosurics are important in managing conditions like gout.
meanings.sent3: The little uricosuric pill danced in my hand, ready to work its magic.
meanings.sent4: The uricosuric acted like a janitor, sweeping away uric acid from the body.
meanings.sent5: I saw the uricosuric as a tiny hero, fighting against uric acid villains in my system.
